document.full_text: united technologies corp's  pratt & whitney unit has won u.s. navy contract updates totaling about $1 billion to provide engines for the multi-national f-35 fighter jet program, the pentagon said on friday.
document.title: united technologies in $1 billion u.s. engine deal
lines_and_colors: united technologies corp's  pratt & whitney unit has won u.s. navy contract updates totaling about $1 billion to provide engines for the multi-national f-35 fighter jet program, the pentagon said on friday.
